analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa nidassana duka sa nidassana ttika

original: Nasanidassanaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassanam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa nidassanaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka

original: Nasanidassanaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa nidassanam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anidassanaḥ anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasanidassanaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa nidassanam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anidassanaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
